Stay Safe and Informed with Activazon.en: Stay Safe and Informed with Activazon
Stay Safe and Informed with Activazon.es: Mantente informado y seguro con Activazon

We understand that staying informed and.en: We understand that staying informed and safe is a top priority, and that's where we come in. Our service analyzes and detects crime in neighborhoods to help residents and travelers stay informed and make informed decisions about where to go and when to be extra cautious.
We understand that staying informed and.es: Entendemos que mantenerse informado y seguro es una prioridad y es aquí donde entramos. Nuestro servicio analiza y detecta delitos en barrios para ayudar a residentes y viajeros a mantenerse informados y tomar decisiones informadas sobre adónde ir y cuándo ser extra cautelosos.

We are always on the look out for you.en: We are always on the look out for you
We are always on the look out for you.es: Siempre estamos atentos a tu seguridad

Activazon is always analyzing and lookin.en: Activazon is always analyzing and looking for updates on incidents to keep you informed and safe. We use publicly available information to generate summaries and alerts, so you can stay informed about crime in your neighborhood or destination.
Activazon is always analyzing and lookin.es: Activazon siempre está analizando y buscando actualizaciones sobre incidentes para mantenerte informado y seguro. Utilizamos información públicamente disponible para generar resúmenes y alertas, para que puedas mantenerte informado sobre el delito en tu barrio o destino.

Take Control of Your Safety.es: Toma el control de tu seguridad

Sign Up to stay one step ahead by gettin.en: Sign Up to stay one step ahead by getting crime reports for your neighborhood or where your next trip will be.
Sign Up to stay one step ahead by gettin.es: Regístrate para mantenerte un paso adelante al recibir informes de delitos en tu barrio o en el lugar de tu próximo viaje.

Get an in-depth analysis of crime trends.en: Get an in-depth analysis of crime trends in {{address}} with Activazon. Sign up for a free account to access personalized crime reports and stay informed about local activity.
Get an in-depth analysis of crime trends.es: Obtén un análisis detallado de las tendencias delictivas en {{address}} con Activazon. Regístrate para obtener una cuenta gratuita y acceder a informes de delitos personalizados y mantenerte informado sobre la actividad local.

Don't see your neighborhood? Help us exp.en: Don't see your neighborhood? Help us expand!

We're sorry that we don't currently have.en: We're sorry that we don't currently have information for your desired location, but you can help us change that! By signing up, you'll become a part of our community of users who are working to make Activazon the most comprehensive resource for community safety.
We're sorry that we don't currently have.es: ¿Quieres ser uno de los primeros en saber cuándo llegamos a tu vecindario? Regístrate hoy y te mantendremos informado de nuestro progreso. Juntos, podemos marcar la diferencia en la seguridad de nuestras comunidades. ¡Únete a nosotros hoy!

To receive alerts about activity that ha.en: To receive alerts about activity that happens in {{placeDisplayName}}, turn on push notification. You'll also receive them when you are not on the site. You can turn them off at any time.
To receive alerts about activity that ha.es: Para recibir alertas sobre la actividad que ocurre en {{placeDisplayName}}, active las notificaciones push. También las recibirá cuando no esté en el sitio. Puede desactivarlas en cualquier momento.

Can't turn on push notifications.es: No se pueden activar las notificaciones

It seems like we can't turn on push noti.en: It seems like we can't turn on push notifications for you. You can try turning them on manually in your browser settings or try a different device.
It seems like we can't turn on push noti.es: Parece que no podemos activar las notificaciones push para usted. Puede intentar activarlas manualmente en la configuración de su navegador o probar un dispositivo diferente.
